name: Little Bullet
description:
Little Bullet: Arcade is a 2D shoot 'em up' arcade game where you shoot an enemy with a randomly different falling gun to get scores.

Play in fullscreen to enchant playing experience (Press F11)
"How to play" and "credit" are in the game menu, so I hope you enjoy this.

I put an easter egg inside this little game too, so guess what!?
